quote_first: The prisoners would be allowed out of their cells to watch the World Cup match between England and Argentina. At
quote_last: , the doors were unlocked and the prisoners flooded out of their cells, all heading in one direction.
title: A Prisoner of Birth
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: He was tearing off on his bicycle to one of the jobs about
quote_last: to see if he could catch anyone leaving off for dinner before the proper time.
title: The Ragged Trousered Philanthropists

quote_first:
What time did you arrive at the site?
“It was
quote_last: . I remember since I happened to glance at my watch when we got there. We rode our bicycles to the bottom of the hill, as far as we could go, then climbed the rest of the way on foot.”
title: Kafka on the Shore
author: Haruki Murakami
